categories.name: ai

categories.description: Backend frameworks (Django, Spring, Express, NestJS, etc.)

categories.name: healthcare

categories.name: ide
categories.description: Integrated development environments (Delphi, Visual Studio, PowerBuilder, etc.)

categories.name: identity
categories.description: Identity & access management (Auth0, Okta, Keycloak, etc.)

categories.name: library
categories.description: Utility libraries (JSON processing, validation, cryptography, etc.)

categories.name: messaging

categories.name: mobile_framework

categories.name: runtime
categories.description: Runtime environments (Node.js runtime, Python runtime, etc.)

categories.name: ui
